display.title: Laser Engraving
description: The &&3Laser Engraver&&r engraves patterns into &&9Silicon Wafers&&r based on the type of &&9Lens&&r it is given. After the wafers are engraved, they must be passed through a &&3Cutting Machine&&r to turn them into components ready to be put into Circuits.
Higher tier Engravers can etch more complex wafers for more efficient Circuits.
